number of butts he has == X
floor division == // (take away the remainder)
remainder of division == %
number of total smokes == X//5 + [X//5+X%5]//5 + {[X//5+X%5]//5+[X//5+X%5]%5}//5 + ... until the previous result plus the remainder of the one before that when divided by 5, all divided by 5, is less than 5.
so the answer is 25//5 + [25//5+25%5]//5 == 5 + [5+0]//5 == 5 + 1 == 6
